system.description:
You have learned to draw upon your artifact to enhance your studied magical abilities. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your wielder levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of determining what you can recover with @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iqlgotutphoratct]{Arcane Recovery}. You cannot recover spell slots of a greater level than would be granted by your wizard level alone.
  • Half your wielder levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.aap4al37tcw2f7o6]{Spell Study} feature. In addition, when you acquire that feature, you automatically gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.akmjwqw4tehikiop]{Arcane Objects} option for it in addition to your choice of the other two.
  • You gain an additional benefit based on your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.i6yg9jmich8u6jjx]{Bonded Artifact} type:
    • If your Bonded Artifact is an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}, it protects you against disruption of your magic. You gain an expertise die to Concentration checks and half your wizard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of gaining access to the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ukdth285bnj3w3qc]{Relic's Focus} feature.
    • If your Bonded Artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}, it increases your connection to magic. One-third of your wielder levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of advancing your wizard spellcasting.
    • If your bonded artifact is a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, you gain proficiency with one of the following combat traditions: Cutting Omen, Mirror’s Glint, or Tempered Iron. You gain a maneuver of a level you could learn from the selected combat tradition. It does not count against your maneuvers known. You also learn two cantrips of your choice from the weaponry or attack schools.
